name: Acuity Brands, Inc.
description: Acuity Brands, Inc. is a leading provider of innovative lighting and building management solutions. Founded in 2001 and headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, Acuity Brands designs and manufactures a wide range of indoor and outdoor lighting products, lighting controls, and related technology. The company operates through several well-known brands, including Lithonia Lighting, Holophane, and Gotham, among others. Acuity Brands is committed to advancing the quality of life through innovative, sustainable, and intelligent lighting solutions that enhance the environments where people live, work, and play. With a focus on energy efficiency, the company integrates smart technology into its products, allowing for enhanced control and automation in response to the growing demand for smart buildings and IoT applications. Acuity Brands also emphasizes sustainability, offering products that comply with environmental standards and help reduce energy consumption. The company's dedication to innovation is reflected in its ongoing investments in research and development, aiming to lead the industry in smart lighting and controls. As a trusted partner to architects, engineers, contractors, and end-users, Acuity Brands is well-positioned to meet the evolving needs of the market and contribute to a brighter, more energy-efficient future.
